website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand name in all kinds of car paint delivers a high level of quality in this wheel paint.
pros: Resists scratches and nicks, while also guarding nicely against rust
Durable wheel paint that works on metal wheels, as well as hubcaps, car grilles, and motorcycles
Application process is extremely easy, so you can finish the job in a short amount of time
cons: Color may not quite match what's shown with the cap of the can

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product nicer than matte
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply I didn't even try to cover the tire. Bought 2 cans for a second coat and still have some left. I see alot of cars with matte finish but this semi gloss is perfect in between. Not too shiny like the gloss finish but not too dull either. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Wow! At first I was skeptical about how the color was going to come out, I'm impressed how with just one coat I brought this rims to life. Even at night with poor lighting my rims shine as new.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ALTERNATIVE
customer_reviews.text: bought this silver argent wheel paint and a can of primer to do my wheel covers for a 2007 Honda civic, I could have bought brand new from Honda at a ridiculous price for each one, or after market for a little less ridiculous price, so I decided to prime and argent paint my own and let me tell you they look better than expected at a fraction of the price. this is great wheel paint, results were fantastic. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D

customer_reviews.title: Great for refinishing or painting your wheels
customer_reviews.text: Had to refinish my matte black rims so I decide to spray over with this semi gloss wheel paint. I must say before using it I did a thorough job cleaning and prepping my wheels to be sprayed. The results were awesome wheels looked almost brand new it did well covering scuffs and chips. It sprays evenly without much residue. It will dry in about 10 minutes but I would recommend 30-45 minutes for a better longer lasting finish. For 4 wheels I used almost 2 cans.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Did add a clear coat to help seal it after.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole Boydston

customer_reviews.title: No match for Tesla Model 3 Aero Wheels
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking about getting this to touch up the Tesla Model 3 Aero wheels, it’s not an exact match. Please see attached photos. The color is a little lighter. Also note: apparently spray cans are not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Chau

customer_reviews.title: Actually matches GM Argent Silver
customer_reviews.text: It's the only silver that actually matches (IMHO) the later GM argent silver wheel paint. You won't find anything to exactly match the early rally wheels as the silver has a touch of green in it. I do hate the spray top though
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: works awesome. lays down very nice
customer_reviews.text: bought this to do my rims with and they turned out awesome! i needed 2 cans for 4 wheels but i put several layers on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stech

customer_reviews.title: Hard work pays off
customer_reviews.text: My rims came out great I used 2K clear coat. If you don't use a premium clear coat all your hard work will be in vain
customer_reviews.author: B $avin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: color is a lot darker than cap, doesn't match most OEM aluminum wheel or hub cap covers
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: The color matches my wife's stock Mini Cooper wheels perfectly. Only difference is this paint is duller, so you'll want to use a clear coat afterwards to match the stock wheel's gloss.
customer_reviews.author: vaughntroy

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: If it's spray paint in a can you want PlastiKote is so much better than the competition, just nothing compares.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Painted 4 wheels and 2 bumpers with 1 can, good paint
customer_reviews.author: Greg E

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works good. One can finished all 4 tires but I ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works good. One can finished all 4 tires but I got a 2nd can to touch up spots that were missed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: did use for wheels, thought it was much brighter as wheels today tend to stand out that way
customer_reviews.author: johnd

customer_reviews.title: Did the Job
customer_reviews.text: Where else l can you find new rims in a can. After 3 coats, my scratches were filled and barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mcfeely

customer_reviews.title: Wheel paint
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is intended for, long drying time but was most likely the humidity when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Michini

customer_reviews.title: Vintage BMW match
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to paint the hub caps on my BMW 1960 R27. It is pretty close to the original silver paint without a lot of expensive analysis. It is a little hard to work with. You must use very light coats to avoid runs but with patience you can get a nice result.
customer_reviews.author: motomacs

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Fast drying and strong. I use it for many applications.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paint
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the only other reviewer is talking about this is NOT brown. It is gray..... Yes, it is PEWTER GRAY. Dried fast, and it's really tough. 2 coats and it lasts a long time. I used it on my Honda Odyssey, and my Accord. It looks great. goes on really even and easily. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Used it on the lower front forks of my Harley ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on the lower front forks of my Harley. Follow the instructions. Covers well with 2 lite cotes. Surprisingly shiny, Lite touch of metallic. Would have given it 5 stars but too soon to tell how well it will ware.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Dont  buy, nothing like the color shown on the cap. Total waste of my time and money! Will never buy from again!!
customer_reviews.text: the color was brown when applied and nothing like the color shown on the cap! Would take the time to return, but not worth the effort! Will never buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: used this waste of noney buy the expensive review lied
customer_reviews.author: Axe

customer_reviews.title: sprays like pwder, can not get a smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: nasty paint, sprays like pwder, can not get a smooth finish, Junk
customer_reviews.author: Albert patty

product_meta.title: PlastiKote 618 Steel Wheel Paint - 12 oz.
product_meta.description: PlastiKote has you covered for your automotive paint, specialty paint, automotive touch up and scratch repair needs!
feature_bullets: 12 oz. can of automotive wheel paint
Specially formulated to provide a tough, long lasting finish that resists scratches and nicks, and will not tarnish, weather or rust
This extremely durable finish is also excellent for hub caps, grilles, auto trim, motorcycles, and bikes
New look, same great product inside

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
